content.rendered:
To kick off this year’s 5th Anniversary season, check out the music lineup for “Take Mom To Main” on Sunday, May 10th.Â  With a roots/blues feel, the music is sure to get Mom’s toes tapping.

The Lineup for May 10:

12:00 The Hiders
http://www.thehiders.com/news.html

1:00 Kelly Thomas & the Fabulous Pick Ups
http://www.myspace.com/kellythomasampthefabulouspickups

2:00 500 Miles to Memphis
http://www.500milesmusic.com/

3:00 Maurice Mattei and the Tempers
http://www.mmattei.com/music.htm
http://www.myspace.com/mauricematteithetempers

4:00 Strawboss

http://www.myspace.com/strawbosshillbillymusic

Subscribe to the RSS feed for updates to the music schedule, as well as any of the events happening during Second Sunday On Main.
